title: Map of Population Density of Africa - conclusions

content.question: Which of the following conclusions is best supported by the map?

choices.label: The Congo River near Kinshasa supports a larger population than all other rivers in Africa.
The highest population densities in Africa are consistently located where rivers meet the ocean.
There is a large population along the Nile River in the area around Cairo.
Population density is consistently the highest along the Atlantic coast.

content.answer: There is a large population along the Nile River in the area around Cairo.

topic.text: 1.2: The African Continent: A Varied Landscape

skill.text: 2.D: Describe and draw conclusions from patterns, trends, and limitations in data, making connections to relevant course content.
